Comment: 오늘은, 에너지의 공유를 이용한 블록체인 기술의 적용에 관한 내용이 인상 깊습니다. 최근 에어비엔비, 우버 등 공유경제를 활용하는 사례가 많은데요, 에너지 분야에서는 블록체인 기술과 함께 어떠한 첨단 기술이 적용되어지고 있는지 확인하실 수 있습니다.
EnglishComment: Today, I am impressed with the application of blockchain technology using energy sharing. There are a lot of recent uses in shared economies such as Air Bienby and Uber. For today's episode, you can see which cutting-edge technologies are being applied along with blockchain technology especially in the energy sector,.

Themes.Theme: Protests for increasing the disel prices in France.
Funeral of former U.S. president George H. W. Bush.
The possible role of blockchain technology in how people get electricity.
How 26 monkeys previously used for research will now spend retirement at a sanctuary in Florida.
